analysis.key_quote: I believe the reclassification of the career civil service employees who participate in the development of funding announcements and oversee the review of grant applications as Schedule F would politicize the NIH, reduce public trust in Federally-funded science, and reduce our ability to identify future cures for diseases that impact all Americans, regardless of political ideology.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the reclassification by highlighting concerns about politicization and its negative impact on public trust and scientific integrity, which aligns with the themes of opposition to the proposed rule.
